metadata.title: Real-Time Ray Tracing with Neural Importance Sampling
metadata.abstract: We present a novel approach to accelerate ray tracing using neural importance sampling. Our method learns importance distributions from previous frames to guide ray sampling in real-time rendering.

classifier.rationale: Focuses on REAL_TIME_RAY_TRACING, NEURAL_RENDERING, SHADER_OPTIMIZATION. Real-time ray tracing techniques with modern GPU support are implementable in WebGL-based projects.

metadata.title: Efficient GPU-Based Mesh Processing for Game Engines
metadata.abstract: This work presents optimization techniques for mesh processing on GPUs with 3x speedup compared to CPU implementations.

classifier.rationale: Focuses on GEOMETRY_PROCESSING, GPU_ACCELERATION, PERFORMANCE_OPTIMIZATION. GPU-optimized techniques are directly applicable to WebGL implementations.

metadata.title: Interactive Volumetric Rendering for Medical Imaging
metadata.abstract: We propose a real-time volumetric rendering system for medical imaging applications using WebGL.

classifier.rationale: Focuses on VOLUMETRIC_RENDERING, GPU_ACCELERATION, REAL_TIME_RAY_TRACING. Real-time ray tracing techniques with modern GPU support are implementable in WebGL-based projects.

metadata.title: Procedural Animation Blending for Character Movement
metadata.abstract: We present an animation system that blends procedural techniques with keyframe animation for smooth character movement.

classifier.rationale: Covers ANIMATION, GPU_ACCELERATION, SHADER_OPTIMIZATION. These techniques integrate well with WebGL rendering pipelines.
